name: Shipment
description:
The Game is a nomadic action exploration game akin to games such as Ark Survival Evolved, Subnuatica, and Volcanoids. You ride a mechanical vehicle that you use to explore the in-game world, you fight giant foes in real-time action combat, and you evolve your vehicle as you progress. 

This is a Prototype made for CSU Fullerton VGDC, I plan on continuing developing this Game, and this Game does not represent the final product in any way.

This Game was made by Adam Kaci, Khang Phi, Danica Vu, Angela Nguyen, Irvin Rafael, and Kendrick Haskins.
